TopicTitle: Uncontrollable retrograde only Spin near Mun

Articles.Content:
OK so no idea whats happening here. My lander/transfer ship which I've used for ages has an odd problem now when I try to burn retro near Mun. When I start the burn it just spins out of control very quickly, if I burn normal/ radial, prograde etc its fine. The ship is fine in Kerbin orbit or on route to Mun burning retro. Seems really odd and I have no idea whats causing it. Any ideas?

Is your gimbal operating backwards??? I'm having a similar problem.
Not that I can tell, but not 100% sure tbh as it spins out of control that fast. However if I disable gimbal then it works fine.

That sure sounds like the same issue I'm having. I reverted back to 1.02 for now. I am using many of the same mods you are, I figured it'd be best to just wait to update 1.04 until the majority of the mods I use are updated. Here's my modlist if you want to do any further digging.
